```{r warning=FALSE,message=FALSE}
library(Lahman)
library(sqldf)
library(ggplot2)
```

#This is where the text will go.

```{r}
query<-"SELECT weight
FROM Master"

result<-sqldf(query)

ggplot()+
  geom_histogram(data=result,aes(x=weight),color="blue",fill="black",bins=50)+
  ggtitle("Body Weight Distribution for Baseball Players")
```
